## GGPlot

```{r cars}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
penguins
```

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, color = species, size = bill_length_mm)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.8) +
  labs(x = "Flipper Length (mm)", y = "Body Mass (g)")
```
